ingredients: chicken, rice, onion, garlic, soy sauce
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 200 grams, diced
Rice: 1 cup cooked rice (preferably cold or leftover rice)
Onion: 1 medium, finely chopped
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Soy Sauce: 2 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Prepare Ingredients: Dice the chicken, finely chop the onion, and mince the garlic.
2:Cook the Chicken: In a large pan, heat a tablespoon of oil and cook the diced chicken until browned, then set aside.
3:Sauté Onion and Garlic: In the same pan, add more oil if needed, then sauté the onion and garlic until fragrant.
4:Add Rice and Soy Sauce: Add the cooked rice, chicken, and soy sauce, stirring to mix evenly and heat through.
5:Serve: Serve the chicken fried rice hot, optionally garnished with green onions or sesame seeds.

ingredients: pasta, tomato sauce, ground beef, onion, garlic
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 200 grams (spaghetti or any pasta of choice)
Tomato Sauce: 1 cup (240 ml)
Ground Beef: 200 grams
Onion: 1 medium, finely chopped
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Steps:
1:Prepare Ingredients: Finely chop the onion, mince the garlic, and cook the pasta according to package instructions.
2:Cook the Ground Beef: In a pan, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, then remove excess fat.
3:Sauté Onion and Garlic: In the same pan, sauté the onion and garlic until fragrant and translucent.
4:Add Tomato Sauce: Stir the tomato sauce into the pan, return the beef, and let it simmer for 10-15 minutes.
5:Combine and Serve: Mix the sauce with cooked pasta, toss to coat evenly, and serve hot.

ingredients: salmon, lemon, dill, olive oil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Salmon: 2 fillets (about 200 grams each)
Lemon: 1 lemon, sliced (for garnish) and juice of half a lemon (for marinade)
Dill: 1 tablespoon fresh dill, chopped
Olive Oil: 1 tablespoon
Steps:
1:Prepare Marinade: In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, lemon juice, and chopped dill.
2:Marinate the Salmon: Brush the salmon fillets with the marinade and let sit for 10-15 minutes.
3:Preheat the Grill: Heat the grill or a grill pan over medium-high heat.
4:Grill the Salmon: Place the fillets skin-side down on the grill and cook for 4-5 minutes per side until flaky.
Serve: Garnish with lemon slices and extra dill, and enjoy hot.

ingredients: potato, butter, milk
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Potatoes: 500 grams (about 3 medium-sized potatoes)
Butter: 2 tablespoons
Milk: 1/4 cup (60 ml)
Steps:
1:Prepare Potatoes: Peel and cut the potatoes into evenly sized chunks.
2:Boil Potatoes: Boil the potatoes in salted water for 15-20 minutes until fork-tender, then drain.
3:Mash the Potatoes: Mash the potatoes while hot using a masher or fork.
4:Add Butter and Milk: Mix in the butter and milk, adjusting consistency as needed, and season with salt.
5:Serve: Serve the mashed potatoes warm as a side dish or on their own.

ingredients: lettuce, tomato, cucumber, onion, olive oil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Lettuce: 2 cups, chopped
Tomato: 1 large, diced
Cucumber: 1 medium, diced
Onion: 1/2 medium, thinly sliced
Olive Oil: 2 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Prepare the Vegetables: Chop the lettuce, dice the tomato and cucumber, and thinly slice the onion.
2:Toss Ingredients: In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, tomato, cucumber, and onion.
3:Add Olive Oil: Drizzle olive oil over the salad and toss to coat evenly.
4:Season: Optionally, add salt, pepper, and a squeeze of lemon juice for extra flavor.
5:Serve: Serve immediately as a fresh and healthy side salad.

ingredients: beef, onion, bell pepper, tomato, cumin
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Beef: 300 grams, thinly sliced
Onion: 1 medium, sliced into strips
Bell Pepper: 1 large, sliced into strips
Tomato: 1 medium, diced
Cumin: 1 teaspoon (ground)
Steps:
1:Prepare Ingredients: Slice the beef, onion, and bell pepper into thin strips and dice the tomato.
2:Season the Beef: Toss the beef with cumin, salt, and pepper for flavor.
3:Cook the Beef: In a hot skillet, sear the beef for 3-4 minutes until browned, then set aside.
4:Sauté Vegetables: In the same pan, cook the onion and bell pepper until soft, then stir in the diced tomato.
5:Combine and Serve: Return the beef to the skillet, mix well, and serve hot with tortillas or as desired

ingredients: chicken, tortilla, lettuce, cheese, salsa
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 200 grams, cooked and shredded or diced.
Tortilla: 4 small-sized tortillas (soft or hard shell)
Lettuce: 1 cup, shredded
Cheese: 1/2 cup, shredded (cheddar or your choice)
Salsa: 1/2 cup (store-bought or homemade)
Steps:
1:Prepare Ingredients: Cook and shred the chicken, shred the lettuce and cheese, and warm the tortillas.
2:Assemble Base: Place a tortilla on a plate and add a layer of shredded chicken in the center.
3:Add Lettuce and Cheese: Top the chicken with shredded lettuce and cheese.
4:Finish with Salsa: Spoon salsa over the toppings for flavor.
5:Serve: Fold the tortilla, serve immediately, and enjoy your tacos.

ingredients: rice, beans, avocado, tomato, cilantro
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Rice: 1 cup, cooked
Beans: 1 cup, cooked (black or pinto beans)
Avocado: 1, diced or sliced
Tomato: 1 medium, diced
Cilantro: 2 tablespoons, chopped
Steps:
1:Prepare Ingredients: Cook the rice and beans if not pre-cooked, and dice the avocado and tomato.
2:Assemble the Base: In a bowl, layer the cooked rice and beans as the base.
3:Add Fresh Toppings: Top with diced avocado, tomato, and a sprinkle of chopped cilantro.
4:Season: Optionally, add salt, pepper, or a squeeze of lime juice for extra flavor.
Serve: Serve immediately as a fresh, healthy, and vibrant rice bowl.

ingredients: egg, cheese, spinach, tomato, onion
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Eggs: 2 large
Cheese: 1/4 cup, shredded (cheddar or your choice)
Spinach: 1/2 cup, chopped
Tomato: 1 small, diced
Onion: 1/4 medium, finely chopped
Steps:
1:Prepare Ingredients: Chop the spinach, onion, and tomato, and shred the cheese. Beat the eggs in a bowl with a pinch of salt.
2:Cook Vegetables: Sauté onion, spinach, and tomato in a non-stick pan for 2 minutes until softened.
3:Add Eggs: Pour the beaten eggs over the vegetables and cook over medium heat until the edges set.
4:Add Cheese: Sprinkle shredded cheese on one side of the omelette and fold it in half.
5:Serve: Cook for another minute, slide onto a plate, and serve hot.

ingredients: quinoa, black beans, corn, bell pepper, lime
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Quinoa: 1 cup, cooked
Black Beans: 1 cup, cooked or canned (rinsed and drained)
Corn: 1/2 cup, cooked or canned (drained)
Bell Pepper: 1 medium, diced (any color)
Lime: Juice of 1 lime
Steps:
1:Prepare Ingredients: Cook the quinoa, rinse and drain the black beans, and dice the bell pepper.
2:Combine Ingredients: In a large bowl, mix the quinoa, black beans, corn, and diced bell pepper.
3:Add Lime Juice: Squeeze fresh lime juice over the mixture and toss to combine.
4:Season: Optionally, add salt, pepper, or chopped cilantro for extra flavor.
5:Serve: Serve chilled or at room temperature as a refreshing, healthy salad.

ingredients: shrimp, pasta, garlic, butter, lemon
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Shrimp: 200 grams, peeled and deveined
Pasta: 200 grams (spaghetti or your choice)
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Butter: 2 tablespoons
Lemon: Juice of 1 lemon and zest of 1/2 lemon
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, drain, and set aside.
2:Sauté the Shrimp: In a large pan, melt 1 tablespoon of butter and cook the shrimp for 2-3 minutes per side until pink.
3:Cook the Garlic: Add the remaining butter and garlic to the pan, cooking until fragrant.
4:Add Lemon and Pasta: Stir in lemon juice and zest, then toss the cooked pasta with the shrimp and sauce.
5:Serve: Serve hot, garnished with parsley or extra lemon zest if desired.

ingredients: salmon, asparagus, lemon, olive oil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Salmon: 2 fillets (about 200 grams each)
Asparagus: 200 grams, trimmed
Lemon: 1 lemon, sliced (for garnish) and juice of 1/2 lemon
Olive Oil: 2 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Prepare Ingredients: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Trim the asparagus and slice the lemon.
2:Season Salmon and Asparagus: Place the salmon and asparagus on a baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.
3:Add Lemon: Squeeze lemon juice over the salmon and asparagus, and place lemon slices on top of the salmon.
4:Roast in Oven: Roast for 12-15 minutes, until the salmon is cooked through and asparagus is tender.
5:Serve: Serve hot, garnished with extra lemon slices for added freshness.

ingredients: chicken, broccoli, teriyaki sauce, sesame seeds
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 200 grams, diced or thinly sliced
Broccoli: 1 cup, florets
Teriyaki Sauce: 1/4 cup
Sesame Seeds: 1 teaspoon, toasted
Steps:
1:Prepare Ingredients: Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces and separate broccoli into florets.
2:Cook the Chicken: In a pan, cook the chicken over medium heat until browned and fully cooked, then set aside.
3:Steam Broccoli: Steam or sauté broccoli for 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp.
4:Combine with Sauce: Return chicken to the pan, add teriyaki sauce, and stir until everything is evenly coated.
5:Serve: Garnish with toasted sesame seeds and serve hot with rice or noodles if desired.

ingredients: penne pasta, cream, parmesan cheese, bacon, peas
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Penne Pasta: 200 grams
Cream: 1/2 cup (heavy cream or whipping cream)
Parmesan Cheese: 1/4 cup, grated
Bacon: 4 strips, chopped
Peas: 1/2 cup, frozen or fresh
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the penne pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside.
2:Cook the Bacon: In a pan, cook the chopped bacon over medium heat until crispy, then remove and set aside.
3:Prepare the Cream Sauce: In the same pan, add cream and grated parmesan cheese, stirring until the sauce thickens.
4:Add Peas: Stir in the peas and cooked pasta, mixing until the pasta is evenly coated with the creamy sauce.
5:Serve: Top with crispy bacon and serve hot, optionally garnished with more parmesan.

ingredients: ground turkey, onion, garlic, chili powder, beans
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Ground Turkey: 300 grams
Onion: 1 medium, chopped
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Chili Powder: 1 tablespoon
Beans: 1 cup (black beans, kidney beans, or a mix, cooked or canned)
Steps:
1:Prepare Ingredients: Chop the onion, mince the garlic, and rinse and drain the beans if using canned.
2:Cook the Ground Turkey: In a large pot, cook the ground turkey over medium heat until browned and fully cooked.
3:Sauté Onion and Garlic: Add the chopped onion and minced garlic to the pot, cooking until softened and fragrant.
4:Add Beans and Chili Powder: Stir in the beans and chili powder, then add a bit of water or broth to create a thick, stew-like consistency.
5:Simmer and Serve: Let the chili simmer for 20-30 minutes, then serve hot with a side of steamed broccoli or toppings like sour cream.

ingredients: potatoes, bell pepper, onion, sausage, eggs
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Potatoes: 3 medium, diced
Bell Pepper: 1 large, diced
Onion: 1 medium, chopped
Sausage: 2 sausages (about 200 grams), removed from casing and crumbled
Eggs: 2 large
Steps:
1:Prepare Ingredients: Dice the potatoes, bell pepper, and onion, and crumble the sausage.
2:Cook the Potatoes: In a large skillet, cook the diced potatoes in a little oil until tender and lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
3:Cook the Sausage: Add the crumbled sausage to the skillet, cooking until browned and cooked through.
4:Add Vegetables: Stir in the bell pepper and onion, cooking until the vegetables are softened.
5:Cook the Eggs: Push the mixture to one side of the skillet, crack the eggs into the empty side, and cook them sunny-side up or scrambled, as desired.
6:Serve: Serve the skillet hot, mixing the eggs into the sausage and potato mixture.

ingredients: salmon, cucumber, yogurt, dill, lemon
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Salmon: 2 fillets (about 200 grams each)
Cucumber: 1 small, grated or finely chopped
Yogurt: 1/2 cup (Greek or plain yogurt)
Dill: 1 tablespoon, chopped
Lemon: Juice of 1/2 lemon and lemon wedges for garnish
Steps:
1:Prepare Cucumber Yogurt Sauce: Mix the grated cucumber, yogurt, chopped dill, and lemon juice in a bowl.
2:Season the Salmon: Drizzle olive oil, salt, and pepper over the salmon fillets.
3:Grill the Salmon: Preheat the grill and cook the salmon fillets for 4-5 minutes per side until cooked through.
4:Serve with Sauce: Plate the grilled salmon and top with the cucumber yogurt sauce, garnishing with lemon wedges and extra dill if desired.
5:Enjoy: Serve immediately as a light, fresh meal with a side salad or vegetables.
recipe_name: Grilled Salmon with Cucumber Yogurt Sauce

ingredients: pasta, broccoli, garlic, red pepper flakes, olive oil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 200 grams (spaghetti or any pasta of choice)
Broccoli: 1 cup, florets
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Red Pepper Flakes: 1/2 teaspoon
Olive Oil: 2 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain, reserving some pasta water.
2:Prepare the Broccoli: In the same pot, steam or blanch the broccoli for 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp, then set aside.
3:Sauté Garlic and Red Pepper Flakes: In a pan, heat olive oil over medium heat, then sauté the garlic and red pepper flakes until fragrant.
4:Combine Pasta and Broccoli: Add the cooked pasta and broccoli to the pan, tossing to coat in the garlic oil, adding a bit of reserved pasta water to loosen the sauce.
5:Serve: Serve immediately, optionally garnished with parmesan or fresh herbs.

ingredients: chicken, bell pepper, onion, pineapple, soy sauce
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 300 grams, boneless and skinless, cut into bite-sized pieces
Bell Pepper: 1 large, diced
Onion: 1 medium, sliced
Pineapple: 1/2 cup, diced (fresh or canned)
Soy Sauce: 2 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Prepare the Chicken: Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces and season lightly with salt and pepper.
2:Cook the Chicken: In a hot pan or wok, cook the chicken pieces until browned and cooked through, then remove and set aside.
3:Sauté the Vegetables: In the same pan, cook the bell pepper and onion until tender, then add the diced pineapple.
4:Add Soy Sauce: Pour the soy sauce over the vegetables, stirring to coat them and create a flavorful sauce.
5:Combine and Serve: Return the chicken to the pan, mix everything together, and serve hot with rice or noodles.

ingredients: rice, ground beef, onion, bell pepper, tomato
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Rice: 1/2 cup, cooked
Ground Beef: 300 grams
Onion: 1 medium, chopped
Bell Pepper: 4 large, tops cut off and seeds removed
Tomato: 1 large, diced
Steps:
1:Prepare the Filling: In a pan, cook the ground beef until browned, then add the chopped onion and cook until softened.
2:Add Tomato and Rice: Stir in the diced tomato and cooked rice, mixing well to combine. Season with salt, pepper, and any desired spices.
3:Stuff the Peppers: Carefully stuff the bell peppers with the beef and rice mixture, pressing down gently to pack the filling.
4:Bake the Peppers: Place the stuffed peppers in a baking dish, cover with foil, and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30 minutes.
5:Serve: Remove the foil and bake for an additional 10 minutes, then serve the stuffed peppers hot.

ingredients: pasta, shrimp, garlic, butter, parsley
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 200 grams (spaghetti or your choice)
Shrimp: 200 grams, peeled and deveined
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Butter: 2 tablespoons
Parsley: 2 tablespoons, chopped
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside.
2:Cook the Shrimp: In a large pan, melt butter over medium heat and cook the shrimp for 2-3 minutes on each side until pink and cooked through.
3:Sauté Garlic: Add the minced garlic to the pan and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant, then add a bit of pasta water if needed.
4:Combine Pasta and Shrimp: Add the cooked pasta to the pan with the shrimp, tossing everything together to coat in the garlic butter sauce.
5:Serve: Garnish with chopped parsley and serve immediately for a delicious, creamy shrimp pasta.

ingredients: beef, tortilla, cheese, lettuce, salsa
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Beef: 300 grams, ground
Tortilla: 4 large flour tortillas
Cheese: 1 cup, shredded (cheddar, Mexican blend, or your choice)
Lettuce: 1 cup, shredded
Salsa: 1/2 cup
Steps:
1:Cook the Beef: In a pan, cook the ground beef over medium heat, seasoning with salt and pepper until browned and cooked through.
2:Warm the Tortillas: Heat the tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave for a few seconds until soft and pliable.
3:Assemble the Burritos: Place a portion of cooked beef in the center of each tortilla, followed by shredded cheese, lettuce, and salsa.
4:Roll the Burritos: Fold in the sides of the tortilla and roll it up tightly to enclose the filling.
5:Serve: Serve the beef burritos warm, optionally with extra salsa or sour cream on the side

ingredients: egg, spinach, mushroom, onion, cheese
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Egg: 3 large
Spinach: 1 cup, fresh
Mushroom: 1/2 cup, sliced
Onion: 1 small, chopped
Cheese: 1/4 cup, shredded (cheddar, feta, or your choice)
Steps:
1:Sauté Vegetables: In a pan, cook the onions and sliced mushrooms over medium heat until softened and lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
2:Add Spinach: Stir in the fresh spinach and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.
3:Whisk the Eggs: In a bowl, whisk the eggs with a pinch of salt and pepper.
4:Cook the Eggs: Pour the eggs into the pan with the vegetables and cook, stirring occasionally, until scrambled and fully cooked.
5:Add Cheese: Sprinkle cheese over the scramble and stir until melted and creamy, then serve hot.

ingredients: salmon, lemon, rosemary, butter
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Salmon: 2 fillets (about 200 grams each)
Lemon: 1 lemon (slices for garnish and juice of 1/2 lemon)
Rosemary: 2 sprigs, fresh
Butter: 2 tablespoons, melted
Steps:
1:Prepare the Salmon: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Place salmon fillets on a lined baking sheet and drizzle with melted butter.
2:Add Seasoning: Top each fillet with fresh rosemary sprigs, a squeeze of lemon juice, and lemon slices.
3:Bake the Salmon: Bake the salmon in the oven for 12-15 minutes until it flakes easily with a fork.
4:Serve: Remove the rosemary sprigs, garnish with fresh lemon slices, and serve hot with a side of your choice.

ingredients: chicken, teriyaki sauce, pineapple, bell pepper, onion
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 300 grams, boneless and cut into bite-sized pieces
Teriyaki Sauce: 1/4 cup
Pineapple: 1/2 cup, diced (fresh or canned)
Bell Pepper: 1 large, diced
Onion: 1 medium, sliced
Steps:
1:Cook the Chicken: In a large pan or wok, cook the chicken over medium heat until browned and fully cooked, then set aside.
2:Sauté the Vegetables: In the same pan, cook the onion and bell pepper for 3-4 minutes until tender.
3:Add Pineapple and Sauce: Stir in the pineapple and teriyaki sauce, cooking until the sauce thickens slightly.
4:Combine and Heat: Return the cooked chicken to the pan and toss everything together to coat evenly.
5:Serve: Serve the stir-fry hot over steamed rice or noodles for a complete meal.

ingredients: quinoa, chicken, black beans, corn, avocado
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Quinoa: 1 cup, cooked
Chicken: 200 grams, grilled or shredded
Black Beans: 1/2 cup, cooked or canned (rinsed and drained)
Corn: 1/2 cup, cooked or canned
Avocado: 1 medium, sliced
Steps:
1:Cook the Quinoa: Rinse and cook 1 cup of quinoa according to package instructions, then let it cool slightly.
2:Prepare the Chicken: Grill or cook the chicken, then shred or dice it into bite-sized pieces.
3:Assemble the Bowl: Layer cooked quinoa in a bowl, then top with chicken, black beans, corn, and avocado slices.
4:Season: Optionally, drizzle with lime juice, olive oil, or your favorite dressing for added flavor.
5:Serve: Serve the quinoa chicken bowl fresh and enjoy as a healthy, balanced meal.

ingredients: pasta, pesto sauce, tomato, mozzarella cheese, basil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 200 grams (penne, fusilli, or your choice)
Pesto Sauce: 1/4 cup
Tomato: 1 large, diced (or 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved)
Mozzarella Cheese: 1/2 cup, diced or pearl mozzarella
Basil: 1/4 cup, fresh leaves
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside.
2:Mix with Pesto: Toss the warm pasta with pesto sauce until evenly coated.
3:Add Tomatoes and Cheese: Gently fold in the diced tomatoes and mozzarella cheese. 4:Garnish with Basil: Top with fresh basil leaves for an aromatic finish.
5:Serve: Serve the Pesto Caprese Pasta warm or chilled as a flavorful and refreshing dish

ingredients: shrimp, avocado, tomato, onion, cilantro
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Shrimp: 200 grams, cooked and chopped
Avocado: 1 large, diced
Tomato: 1 large, diced (or 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved)
Onion: 1/2 medium, finely chopped
Cilantro: 2 tablespoons, chopped
Steps:
1:Prepare the Shrimp: Cook and chop the shrimp into bite-sized pieces, then let them cool.
2:Combine Vegetables: In a bowl, mix the diced avocado, tomato, onion, and cilantro.
3:Add Shrimp: Gently fold in the shrimp, taking care not to mash the avocado.
4:Season: Optionally, add lime juice, salt, and pepper to taste for a fresh, tangy flavor.
5:Serve: Serve the shrimp avocado salsa chilled with tortilla chips or as a light appetizer.

ingredients: chicken, barbecue sauce, corn, black beans, cilantro
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 200 grams, cooked and shredded or diced
Barbecue Sauce: 1/4 cup
Corn: 1/2 cup, cooked or canned
Black Beans: 1/2 cup, cooked or canned (rinsed and drained)
Cilantro: 2 tablespoons, chopped
Steps:
1:Prepare the Chicken: Toss the cooked chicken with barbecue sauce until evenly coated.
2:Combine Salad Base: In a large bowl, mix the corn, black beans, and chopped cilantro.
3:Add the Chicken: Place the barbecue chicken on top of the mixed salad base.
4:Toss Lightly: Gently toss the salad to combine the flavors, or layer for a composed look.
5:Serve: Serve the barbecue chicken salad immediately as a fresh and flavorful meal.

ingredients: rice, beef, broccoli, carrot, soy sauce
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Rice: 1 cup, cooked (as a side)
Beef: 300 grams, thinly sliced (sirloin or flank steak recommended)
Broccoli: 1 cup, florets
Carrot: 1 medium, julienned or sliced thinly
Soy Sauce: 1/4 cup
Steps
1:Prepare the Beef: Slice the beef thinly, season lightly, and set aside.
2:Cook the Vegetables: Sauté broccoli and carrot in a hot pan until tender-crisp, then set aside.
3:Cook the Beef: In the same pan, stir-fry the beef slices until browned and cooked through.
4:Add Soy Sauce: Return the vegetables to the pan, pour in the soy sauce, and toss everything to coat.
5:Serve: Serve the beef and broccoli stir-fry over cooked rice for a balanced, hearty meal.

ingredients: pasta, tomato sauce, garlic, olive oil, basil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 200 grams (spaghetti, penne, or your choice)
Tomato Sauce: 1 cup
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Olive Oil: 2 tablespoons
Basil: 2 tablespoons, fresh, chopped
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside, reserving some pasta water.
2:Sauté Garlic: In a pan, heat olive oil over medium heat and sauté the minced garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute.
3:Add Tomato Sauce: Pour in the tomato sauce, stirring well, and let it simmer for 5-7 minutes to develop flavor.
4:Combine Pasta and Sauce: Toss the cooked pasta into the sauce, adding reserved pasta water if needed for consistency.
5:Serve: Garnish with fresh basil and serve hot for a simple and delicious meal.

ingredients: salmon, garlic, lemon, olive oil, thyme
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Salmon: 2 fillets (about 200 grams each)
Garlic: 2 cloves, minced
Lemon: 1 lemon (slices for garnish and juice of 1/2 lemon)
Olive Oil: 2 tablespoons
Thyme: 2 sprigs, fresh (or 1 teaspoon dried)
Steps:
1:Prepare the Salmon: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
2:Season the Fillets: Drizzle olive oil over the salmon, then sprinkle with minced garlic, lemon juice, and thyme.
3:Add Lemon Slices: Garnish each fillet with a couple of lemon slices for flavor and presentation.
4:Roast the Salmon: Bake in the oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the salmon flakes easily with a fork.
5:Serve: Serve the salmon hot with your choice of side dishes, like roasted vegetables or rice.

ingredients: chicken, onion, bell pepper, tomato, chili powder
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 300 grams, sliced into strips
Onion: 1 medium, sliced
Bell Pepper: 1 large, sliced (use any color)
Tomato: 1 medium, diced
Chili Powder: 1 teaspoon
Steps:
1:Cook the Chicken: Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook the chicken strips with a drizzle of oil until golden and cooked through.
2:Sauté Vegetables: In the same pan, sauté the onion and bell pepper until softened, about 5 minutes.
3:Add Tomato and Spices: Stir in the diced tomato and chili powder, cooking for 2-3 minutes until well combined.
4:Mix Together: Return the chicken to the pan, tossing everything together to coat in the spices and juices.
5:Serve: Serve the fajita mixture hot in tortillas or over rice, with optional toppings like sour cream or cheese.

ingredients: potatoes, bacon, cheddar cheese, green onion, sour cream
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Potatoes: 4 large baking potatoes
Bacon: 4 strips, cooked and crumbled
Cheddar Cheese: 1 cup, shredded
Green Onion: 2 tablespoons, chopped
Sour Cream: 1/2 cup
Steps
1:Bake the Potatoes: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Wash and pierce the potatoes, then bake for 50-60 minutes until soft.
2:Prepare Toppings: Cook the bacon until crispy, crumble it, and shred the cheddar cheese.
3:Cut and Fluff: Slice the baked potatoes lengthwise, fluff the insides with a fork, and season lightly with salt.
4:Add Toppings: Layer shredded cheese, crumbled bacon, and a dollop of sour cream on each potato.
5:Garnish and Serve: Sprinkle with chopped green onion and serve hot as a hearty side or meal.

ingredients: beef, cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Beef: 500 grams, ground
Cheese: 4 slices (cheddar or your preferred type)
Lettuce: 4 leaves, fresh
Tomato: 1 large, sliced
Onion: 1 medium, sliced
Steps:
1:Form Beef Patties: Divide the ground beef into 4 portions, shape into patties, and season with salt and pepper.
2:Cook the Patties: Cook the patties in a skillet or grill over medium-high heat for 4-5 minutes per side.
3:Melt Cheese: Place a slice of cheese on each patty during the last minute of cooking to melt.
4:Prepare Toppings: Slice the tomato and onion and wash the lettuce leaves.
5:Assemble Burgers: Layer the patties on buns with lettuce, tomato, onion, and your favorite condiments, then serve hot.

ingredients: rice, chicken, bell pepper, onion, pineapple
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Rice: 1 cup, cooked
Chicken: 300 grams, diced (breast or thigh)
Bell Pepper: 1 large, diced (any color)
Onion: 1 medium, diced
Pineapple: 1 cup, diced (fresh or canned)
Steps:
1:Cook the Chicken: Sauté the diced chicken in a skillet with a drizzle of oil until fully cooked and browned.
2:Sauté Vegetables: Add diced onion and bell pepper to the skillet and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
3:Add Pineapple: Stir in the pineapple and cook for 2-3 minutes to warm through and combine flavors.
4:Combine with Rice: Serve the chicken, vegetables, and pineapple mixture over a bowl of cooked rice.
5:Garnish and Serve: Optionally, garnish with soy sauce or herbs and enjoy this flavorful and tropical meal.

ingredients: pasta, chicken, alfredo sauce, broccoli, garlic
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 200 grams (fettuccine or your choice)
Chicken: 200 grams, cooked and diced or shredded
Alfredo Sauce: 1 cup (store-bought or homemade)
Broccoli: 1 cup, cut into small florets
Garlic: 2 cloves, minced
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside.
2:Steam Broccoli: Steam or blanch the broccoli florets for 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp.
3:Sauté Garlic: In a pan, heat a little oil and sauté minced garlic until fragrant.
4:Combine Sauce and Chicken: Add Alfredo sauce and cooked chicken to the pan, simmering until warmed through.
5:Toss Together: Mix the pasta, broccoli, and sauce mixture, toss well, and serve hot.

ingredients: shrimp, garlic, lemon, butter, parsley
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Shrimp: 300 grams, peeled and deveined
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Lemon: 1 lemon (zest and juice)
Butter: 3 tablespoons
Parsley: 2 tablespoons, chopped
Steps:
1:Melt Butter and Sauté Garlic: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat and sauté the minced garlic until fragrant, about 1 minute.
2:Cook the Shrimp: Add the shrimp to the skillet, cooking for 2-3 minutes per side until pink and opaque.
3:Add Lemon Juice and Zest: Stir in the lemon juice and zest, tossing the shrimp to coat evenly.
4:Garnish with Parsley: Remove from heat and sprinkle with fresh parsley for added flavor.
5:Serve: Serve the garlic lemon butter shrimp hot as a main dish or over rice or pasta.

ingredients: chicken, lemon, garlic, rosemary, olive oil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 1 whole chicken (about 1.5 kg) or 4 chicken thighs
Lemon: 1 large (juice and slices)
Garlic: 4 cloves, minced
Rosemary: 2 sprigs, fresh (or 1 teaspoon dried)
Olive Oil: 3 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Preheat and Prep Chicken: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). Pat the chicken dry and place it in a roasting pan.
2:Season the Chicken: Rub the chicken with olive oil, minced garlic, lemon juice, and chopped rosemary.
3:Add Lemon and Rosemary: Place lemon slices and rosemary sprigs on and around the chicken for flavor.
4:Roast the Chicken: Roast in the oven for 45-60 minutes (or until internal temperature reaches 165°F/74°C), basting occasionally.
5:Rest and Serve: Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before slicing, then serve with your favorite sides.

ingredients: rice, tofu, broccoli, carrot, soy sauce
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Rice: 1 cup, cooked
Tofu: 200 grams, firm, cubed
Broccoli: 1 cup, florets
Carrot: 1 medium, julienned or sliced
Soy Sauce: 3 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Prepare Tofu: Pat tofu dry, cube it, and sauté in a hot skillet with a little oil until golden on all sides.
2:Cook Vegetables: Add broccoli and carrot to the skillet, stir-frying for 3-5 minutes until tender-crisp.
3:Add Soy Sauce: Pour in the soy sauce and stir well, ensuring tofu and vegetables are evenly coated.
4:Combine with Rice: Serve the stir-fry mixture over a bowl of warm, cooked rice.
5:Garnish and Serve: Optionally, garnish with sesame seeds or scallions for added flavor.

ingredients: pasta, marinara sauce, mushroom, onion, basil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 200 grams (spaghetti, penne, or your choice)
Marinara Sauce: 1 cup
Mushroom: 1 cup, sliced (button or cremini mushrooms)
Onion: 1 medium, diced
Basil: 2 tablespoons, fresh, chopped
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside.
2:Sauté Vegetables: In a pan, sauté the diced onion and sliced mushrooms in olive oil until soft and golden, about 5-7 minutes.
3:Add Marinara Sauce: Stir in the marinara sauce and simmer for 5-10 minutes to combine the flavors.
4:Combine with Pasta: Toss the cooked pasta into the sauce mixture, stirring well to coat evenly.
5:Garnish and Serve: Top with fresh basil and serve hot for a flavorful and comforting meal.

ingredients: salmon, spinach, lemon, garlic, olive oil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients
Salmon: 2 fillets (about 200 grams each)
Spinach: 3 cups, fresh
Lemon: 1 lemon (juice and slices for garnish)
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Olive Oil: 2 tablespoons
Steps
1:Cook the Salmon: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat, and cook the salmon fillets for 4-5 minutes per side until golden and cooked through.
2:Sauté Garlic and Spinach: In the same skillet, add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute, then add spinach and cook until wilted.
3:Add Lemon Juice: Squeeze lemon juice over the cooked spinach and salmon for a fresh, tangy flavor.$
4:Serve: Plate the salmon, top with the garlic spinach mixture, and garnish with lemon slices for added brightness.

ingredients: chicken, ranch dressing, bacon, cheese, lettuce
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 300 grams, cooked and shredded
Ranch Dressing: 3 tablespoons
Bacon: 4 strips, cooked and crumbled
Cheese: 1/2 cup, shredded (cheddar or your choice)
Lettuce: 1 cup, shredded
Steps:
1:Prepare the Chicken: Shred the cooked chicken and mix it with ranch dressing until well coated.
2:Cook and Crumble Bacon: Cook the bacon until crispy, then crumble it into small pieces.
3:Assemble the Wraps: Place the ranch-coated chicken on a tortilla, and top with crumbled bacon, shredded cheese, and lettuce.
4:Roll and Serve: Roll up the tortilla tightly, slice into wraps, and serve immediately.

ingredients: pasta, pesto sauce, chicken, sun-dried tomato, spinach
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 200 grams (penne or your choice)
Pesto Sauce: 1/3 cup
Chicken: 200 grams, cooked and shredded or cubed
Sun-Dried Tomato: 1/4 cup, chopped
Spinach: 2 cups, fresh
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside.
2:Sauté Chicken and Tomatoes: In a pan, heat a little oil and sauté the cooked chicken and chopped sun-dried tomatoes for 2-3 minutes.
3:Add Spinach: Stir in the fresh spinach and cook until wilted, about 1-2 minutes.
4:Mix in Pesto and Pasta: Add the pesto sauce to the pan, toss in the cooked pasta, and mix everything until well coated.
5:Serve: Plate the pesto chicken pasta, garnish with Parmesan or extra pesto if desired, and serve warm.

ingredients: shrimp, pasta, tomato, garlic, chili flakes
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Shrimp: 200 grams, peeled and deveined
Pasta: 200 grams (spaghetti or your choice)
Tomato: 2 large, diced (or 1 cup canned diced tomatoes)
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Chili Flakes: 1 teaspoon
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside.
2:Sauté Garlic and Shrimp: Heat oil in a pan, add minced garlic and chili flakes, then sauté shrimp until pink and cooked through (2-3 minutes).
3:Prepare the Tomato Sauce: Add diced tomatoes to the pan, simmer for 5-7 minutes, and season with salt and pepper.
4:Combine with Pasta: Toss the cooked pasta into the tomato-shrimp sauce, mixing well to coat evenly.
5:Serve: Plate the spicy tomato shrimp pasta, garnish with fresh herbs if desired, and serve hot.

ingredients: beef, potato, carrot, onion, beef broth
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Beef: 500 grams, cubed (stew meat or chuck roast)
Potato: 2 medium, peeled and cubed
Carrot: 2 medium, peeled and sliced
Onion: 1 large, diced
Beef Broth: 4 cups
Steps:
1:Sear the Beef: In a large pot, heat oil and sear beef cubes until browned on all sides, then remove and set aside.
2:Sauté the Vegetables: Add diced onion, carrot, and potato to the pot, cooking for 5 minutes until slightly softened.
3:Deglaze with Broth: Return the beef to the pot and pour in beef broth, scraping the bottom of the pot to release any browned bits.
4:Simmer the Stew: Cover and simmer on low heat for 1.5-2 hours until the beef is tender and the flavors meld together.
5:Serve: Adjust seasoning with salt and pepper, then ladle the hearty stew into bowls and serve warm.

ingredients: spaghetti, garlic, olive oil, red pepper flakes, parsley
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Spaghetti: 200 grams
Garlic: 4 cloves, thinly sliced
Olive Oil: 1/4 cup
Red Pepper Flakes: 1 teaspoon (adjust to taste)
Parsley: 2 tablespoons, fresh, chopped
Steps:
1:Cook the Spaghetti: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente, reserve 1/2 cup pasta water, and drain.
2:Sauté Garlic: Heat olive oil in a pan, add sliced garlic, and cook over medium heat until golden and fragrant.
3:Add Red Pepper Flakes: Stir in red pepper flakes, cooking briefly to release their flavor without burning.
4:Combine Pasta: Toss the cooked spaghetti in the pan, adding reserved pasta water as needed to coat evenly.
5:Garnish and Serve: Sprinkle with chopped parsley, toss, and serve immediately for a simple, flavorful dish.

ingredients: beef, mushrooms, onion, sour cream, butter
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Beef: 400 grams, thinly sliced (sirloin or tenderloin)
Mushrooms: 2 cups, sliced
Onion: 1 medium, diced
Sour Cream: 1/2 cup
Butter: 2 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Sear the Beef: Heat 1 tablespoon of butter in a pan and sear beef slices for 2-3 minutes until browned, then set aside.
2:Sauté Vegetables: In the same pan, melt the remaining butter, then sauté diced onions and sliced mushrooms until softened.
3:Make the Sauce: Add sour cream to the pan, mix well, and let it simmer gently for 2-3 minutes.
4:Combine Beef and Sauce: Return the seared beef to the pan, stir to coat with the sauce, and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
5:Serve: Serve the beef stroganoff over noodles, rice, or mashed potatoes, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

ingredients: chicken, bell pepper, onion, black beans, corn
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 300 grams, cooked and shredded or cubed
Bell Pepper: 1 large, diced
Onion: 1 medium, diced
Black Beans: 1 cup, cooked or canned (drained and rinsed)
Corn: 1 cup, cooked or canned (drained)
Steps:
1:Sauté Vegetables: Heat oil in a pan, then cook diced bell pepper and onion for 5 minutes until softened.
2:Add Chicken: Stir in the cooked chicken, cooking for 2-3 minutes until heated through.
3:Mix in Beans and Corn: Add black beans and corn to the pan, stir well, and season with salt, pepper, and optional spices like cumin.
4:Simmer Together: Cook for another 5 minutes to let the flavors meld, stirring occasionally.
5:Serve: Scoop into bowls, garnish with fresh herbs or cheese if desired, and enjoy warm.

ingredients: pasta, pesto sauce, pine nuts, parmesan cheese, basil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 200 grams (spaghetti, penne, or your choice)
Pesto Sauce: 1/3 cup
Pine Nuts: 2 tablespoons, toasted
Parmesan Cheese: 1/4 cup, grated
Basil: 2 tablespoons, fresh, chopped
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then reserve 1/4 cup pasta water and drain.
2:Toast Pine Nuts: In a dry skillet, toast pine nuts over medium heat for 2-3 minutes until golden and fragrant.
3:Combine Pasta and Pesto: Toss the cooked pasta with pesto sauce, adding a splash of reserved pasta water to coat evenly.
4:Add Toppings: Mix in toasted pine nuts and half of the grated Parmesan, stirring gently to combine.
5:Serve: Plate the pasta, garnish with fresh basil and remaining Parmesan, and serve warm.

ingredients: salmon, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, honey
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Salmon: 4 fillets (150-200 grams each)
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Ginger: 1 teaspoon, freshly grated
Soy Sauce: 1/4 cup
Honey: 2 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Prepare the Marinade: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, honey, minced garlic, and grated ginger to create a flavorful marinade.
2:Marinate the Salmon: Place the salmon fillets in the marinade for 15-20 minutes, turning occasionally to coat well.
3:Cook the Salmon: Heat a pan over medium heat, then sear the salmon fillets skin-side down for 3-4 minutes.
4:Add Marinade: Pour the remaining marinade into the pan and cook for another 3-4 minutes until the salmon is fully cooked and glazed.
5:Serve: Plate the honey garlic salmon with a drizzle of sauce from the pan, and garnish with optional herbs or sesame seeds.

ingredients: shrimp, garlic, lemon, parsley, white wine
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Shrimp: 200 grams, peeled and deveined
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Lemon: 1, juiced and zested
Parsley: 2 tablespoons, freshly chopped
White Wine: 1/3 cup
Linguine: 200 grams
Steps:
1:Cook the Linguine: Boil linguine in salted water until al dente, then reserve 1/4 cup pasta water and drain.
2:Sauté Garlic and Shrimp: Heat oil in a pan, cook minced garlic until fragrant, then add shrimp and sauté until pink and cooked through.
3:Deglaze with Wine: Pour white wine into the pan, simmer for 2 minutes, and stir in lemon juice and zest.
4:Combine with Linguine: Toss the cooked linguine into the pan with the shrimp and sauce, adding reserved pasta water if needed.
5:Serve: Plate the pasta, garnish with fresh parsley, and serve warm with a sprinkle of Parmesan if desired

ingredients: chicken, bell pepper, onion, pineapple, teriyaki sauce
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 400 grams, diced (boneless, skinless)
Bell Pepper: 1 large, diced
Onion: 1 medium, diced
Pineapple: 1 cup, diced (fresh or canned, drained)
Teriyaki Sauce: 1/3 cup
Steps:
1:Cook the Chicken: In a skillet, heat oil and cook diced chicken for 5-7 minutes until golden and fully cooked.
2:Sauté Vegetables: Add diced bell pepper and onion to the skillet, cooking until tender-crisp, about 3-4 minutes.
3:Add Pineapple: Stir in pineapple chunks and cook for 2-3 minutes to lightly caramelize.
4:Add Teriyaki Sauce: Pour in the teriyaki sauce, stir to coat evenly, and simmer for 2-3 minutes to blend flavors.
5:Serve: Plate the teriyaki chicken with pineapple over rice or noodles, garnished with sesame seeds or green onions if desired.

ingredients: rice, ground beef, black beans, bell pepper, salsa
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Rice: 1 cup, uncooked
Ground Beef: 300 grams
Black Beans: 1 can (15 ounces), drained and rinsed
Bell Pepper: 1 large, diced
Salsa: 1/2 cup
Steps:
1:Cook the Rice: Cook the rice according to package instructions, set aside once done.
2:Brown the Ground Beef: In a large skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned and fully cooked, breaking it apart with a spoon.
3:Sauté Vegetables: Add diced bell pepper to the beef, sautéing for 3-4 minutes until softened.
4:Combine Beans and Salsa: Stir in black beans and salsa, mixing well, and simmer for 5 minutes to heat through.
5:Serve: Serve the beef and vegetable mixture over the cooked rice, garnishing with cilantro or cheese if desired.

ingredients: pasta, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, basil, olive oil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 200 grams (any type, such as spaghetti or penne)
Tomato Sauce: 1 cup
Mozzarella Cheese: 1 cup, shredded or fresh mozzarella (torn into pieces)
Basil: 1/4 cup, fresh, chopped
Olive Oil: 2 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain, reserving 1/4 cup pasta water.
2:Heat Tomato Sauce: In a pan, heat tomato sauce over medium heat with olive oil, stirring to combine and warm through.
3:Combine Pasta and Sauce: Add the cooked pasta to the sauce, tossing to coat, adding reserved pasta water if needed to thin the sauce.
4:Add Mozzarella and Basil: Stir in the mozzarella cheese until melted, then sprinkle in fresh basil and mix gently.
5:Serve: Plate the pasta, drizzle with extra olive oil if desired, and garnish with more basil and mozzarella.

ingredients: salmon, asparagus, garlic, lemon, butter
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Salmon: 4 fillets (about 150-200 grams each)
Asparagus: 1 bunch, trimmed
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Lemon: 1, juiced and zested
Butter: 3 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Prepare the Asparagus: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Place trimmed asparagus on a baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
2:Cook the Salmon: Season salmon fillets with salt, pepper, and lemon zest. Place on the same baking sheet as the asparagus.
3:Melt Butter and Garlic: In a small pan, melt butter and sauté minced garlic for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
4:Roast in the Oven: Place the baking sheet in the oven, roasting for 12-15 minutes until the salmon is cooked through and flakes easily.
5:Finish and Serve: Drizzle the garlic butter over the salmon and asparagus, squeeze lemon juice over, and serve immediately.

ingredients: pasta, garlic, anchovies, red pepper flakes, olive oil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 200 grams (spaghetti or other long pasta)
Garlic: 4 cloves, thinly sliced
Anchovies: 3-4 fillets, finely chopped
Red Pepper Flakes: 1/2 teaspoon (adjust to taste)
Olive Oil: 3 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain, reserving 1/4 cup of pasta water.
2:Sauté Garlic and Anchovies: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat, add sliced garlic and chopped anchovies, cooking until garlic is golden and fragrant.
3:Add Red Pepper Flakes: Stir in red pepper flakes and cook for 30 seconds to infuse the oil with spice.
4:Combine Pasta and Sauce: Add the cooked pasta to the pan, tossing to coat, adding reserved pasta water as needed to create a smooth sauce.
5:Serve: Plate the pasta, drizzle with extra olive oil if desired, and garnish with fresh parsley or grated Parmesan.

ingredients: chicken, bell pepper, onion, zucchini, taco seasoning
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 400 grams, boneless, skinless, diced
Bell Pepper: 1, diced
Onion: 1 medium, diced
Zucchini: 1 medium, diced
Taco Seasoning: 1 packet (or 2 tablespoons homemade)
Steps:
1:Cook the Chicken: Heat a pan over medium heat, add diced chicken, and cook until browned and cooked through, about 7-8 minutes.
2:Sauté the Vegetables: Add diced bell pepper, onion, and zucchini to the pan, cooking until softened, about 5 minutes.
3:Add Taco Seasoning: Stir in the taco seasoning, adding a splash of water (about 1/4 cup) to help create a sauce.
4:Simmer and Combine: Let the mixture simmer for 3-4 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld and the sauce to thicken.
5:Serve: Use the chicken taco filling in soft or hard taco shells, and top with your favorite toppings like cheese, salsa, and sour cream.

ingredients: rice, shrimp, peas, carrots, soy sauce
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Rice: 2 cups, cooked (preferably cold, day-old rice works best)
Shrimp: 300 grams, peeled and deveined
Peas: 1/2 cup, frozen
Carrots: 1/2 cup, diced
Soy Sauce: 2 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Cook the Shrimp: Heat a pan over medium-high heat, cook shrimp until pink and opaque, about 2-3 minutes per side. Remove shrimp and set aside.
2:Sauté the Vegetables: In the same pan, add diced carrots and peas, sauté for 2-3 minutes until tender.
3:Stir-Fry the Rice: Add the cold rice to the pan, breaking up clumps and stirring to combine with the vegetables.
4:Add Soy Sauce: Pour soy sauce over the rice, mixing well to coat all the ingredients evenly.
5:Combine Shrimp and Serve: Add the cooked shrimp back to the pan, stir to combine, and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes before serving.

ingredients: beef, bell pepper, onion, tomatoes, chili powder
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Beef: 500 grams, ground
Bell Pepper: 1, diced
Onion: 1 medium, diced
Tomatoes: 2 medium, chopped (or 1 can of diced tomatoes)
Chili Powder: 2 tablespoons (adjust to taste)
Steps:
1:Cook the Beef: In a large pot, brown the ground beef over medium heat, breaking it up as it cooks. Drain excess fat if needed.
2:Sauté the Vegetables: Add diced onion and bell pepper to the pot, cooking for 5 minutes until softened.
3:Add Tomatoes and Chili Powder: Stir in chopped tomatoes and chili powder, letting the mixture simmer for 10 minutes to develop flavors.
4:Simmer and Season: Adjust seasoning with salt, pepper, or extra chili powder if desired, then simmer for another 15-20 minutes.
5:Serve: Ladle the chili into bowls, and serve with toppings like cheese, sour cream, or cilantro if desired.

ingredients: pasta, alfredo sauce, shrimp, spinach, garlic
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 300 grams (fettuccine or penne works best)
Alfredo Sauce: 1 1/2 cups (store-bought or homemade)
Shrimp: 300 grams, peeled and deveined
Spinach: 2 cups, fresh
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside.
2:Cook the Shrimp: In a pan, sauté shrimp in olive oil over medium heat with minced garlic for 2-3 minutes until pink. Remove and set aside.
3:Sauté the Spinach: In the same pan, add spinach and cook until wilted, about 1-2 minutes.
4:Combine Alfredo Sauce: Add Alfredo sauce to the pan, heat gently, and stir in the cooked pasta.
5:Finish with Shrimp: Add the shrimp back to the pan, toss to coat, and serve warm.

ingredients: chicken, bell pepper, onion, black beans, rice
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 400 grams, diced
Bell Pepper: 1, diced
Onion: 1 medium, diced
Black Beans: 1 cup, cooked or canned (drained and rinsed)
Rice: 2 cups, cooked
Steps:
1:Cook the Chicken: Heat a pan over medium heat, cook diced chicken until browned and cooked through, about 8-10 minutes.
2:Sauté Vegetables: Add diced onion and bell pepper to the pan, cooking until softened, about 5 minutes.
3:Add Black Beans: Stir in black beans and heat through, letting the flavors combine for 2-3 minutes.
4:Combine with Rice: In a large bowl or serving dish, layer the cooked rice and top with the chicken, vegetable, and bean mixture.
5:Serve: Garnish with your choice of salsa, cheese, or cilantro, and serve warm.

ingredients: potatoes, bacon, cheddar cheese, sour cream, chives
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Potatoes: 4 large, baked
Bacon: 4 slices, cooked and crumbled
Cheddar Cheese: 1 cup, shredded
Sour Cream: 1/2 cup
Chives: 2 tablespoons, finely chopped
Steps:
1:Prepare the Potatoes: Cut baked potatoes in half, scoop out the center leaving a thin layer of potato, and set aside the skins.
2:Crisp the Skins: Brush the potato skins with olive oil, place them on a baking sheet, and bake at 400°F (200°C) for 10 minutes.
3:Add Toppings: Fill each skin with shredded cheddar cheese and crumbled bacon, then bake for an additional 5 minutes until cheese melts.
4:Finish with Garnish: Top each potato skin with a dollop of sour cream and sprinkle with chopped chives.
5:Serve: Serve the loaded potato skins hot as an appetizer or side dish.

ingredients: beef, bell pepper, onion, mushrooms, garlic
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Beef: 500 grams, thinly sliced (sirloin or tenderloin)
Bell Pepper: 1, sliced
Onion: 1 medium, thinly sliced
Mushrooms: 2 cups, sliced
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Steps:
1:Cook the Beef: Sear sliced beef in a hot skillet with oil over medium-high heat for 3-4 minutes. Remove and set aside.
2:Sauté Vegetables: In the same skillet, sauté onion, bell pepper, and garlic for 2-3 minutes, then add mushrooms and cook until softened.
3:Combine with Beef: Return the beef to the skillet, mix with the vegetables, and season with salt and pepper.
4:Simmer with Sauce: Add a stroganoff sauce (sour cream and broth, or a store-bought option) and simmer for 5-7 minutes.
5:Serve: Spoon over cooked pasta or rice, garnish with parsley, and serve warm.

ingredients: pasta, tomato sauce, ground turkey, garlic, basil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 300 grams (spaghetti or your choice)
Tomato Sauce: 2 cups
Ground Turkey: 400 grams
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Basil: 2 tablespoons, chopped
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside.
2:Cook the Turkey: Sauté ground turkey in a skillet with olive oil over medium heat until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
3:Add Garlic and Sauce: Stir in minced garlic and tomato sauce, then simmer for 10 minutes to blend flavors.
4:Incorporate Basil: Add chopped basil to the sauce, stirring well, and season with salt and pepper to taste.
5:Serve: Toss the sauce with cooked pasta, garnish with extra basil, and serve warm.

ingredients: salmon, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, sesame seeds
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Salmon: 4 fillets (about 500 grams)
Garlic: 3 cloves, minced
Ginger: 1 tablespoon, freshly grated
Soy Sauce: 1/4 cup
Sesame Seeds: 2 tablespoons, toasted
Steps:
1:Prepare the Marinade: Mix soy sauce, minced garlic, and grated ginger in a bowl.
2:Marinate the Salmon: Place salmon fillets in the marinade for 20 minutes in the refrigerator.
3:Cook the Salmon: Sear salmon in a skillet over medium heat for 3-4 minutes per side, or bake at 400°F (200°C) for 12-15 minutes.
4:Add Sesame Seeds: Sprinkle toasted sesame seeds over the cooked salmon.
5:Serve: Plate the salmon, optionally garnishing with green onions, and serve with rice or steamed vegetables.

ingredients: pasta, alfredo sauce, bacon, peas, parmesan cheese
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 300 grams (fettuccine or penne)
Alfredo Sauce: 1 ½ cups
Bacon: 6 slices, cooked and crumbled
Peas: 1 cup, cooked
Parmesan Cheese: ½ cup, grated
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside.
2:Prepare Bacon: Cook bacon until crispy, crumble, and set aside.
3:Heat Alfredo Sauce: Warm the Alfredo sauce in a skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
4:Combine Ingredients: Mix the pasta, peas, and crumbled bacon into the Alfredo sauce and heat through.
5:Serve: Plate the pasta, sprinkle with Parmesan cheese, and serve warm.

ingredients: shrimp, garlic, lemon, parsley, linguine
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Shrimp: 400 grams, peeled and deveined
Garlic: 4 cloves, minced

Beef: 1 lb (thinly sliced, flank or sirloin works best)
Bell Pepper: 1 large (sliced into strips)
Onion: 1 medium (sliced thinly)
Garlic: 3 cloves (minced)
Hoisin Sauce: 3 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Prepare Ingredients: Slice beef thinly, bell peppers into strips, and onions into thin slices. Mince garlic.
2:Cook Beef: Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry beef until browned and cooked through; remove and set aside.
3:Stir-Fry Vegetables: In the same pan, cook bell peppers, onions, and garlic until tender-crisp, about 45 minutes.
4:Combine and Sauce: Add beef back to the pan, pour in hoisin sauce, and stir until everything is coated and heated through.
5:Serve: Plate the stir-fry hot, optionally garnish with sesame seeds, and serve over rice or noodles.

ingredients: shrimp, garlic, lemon, parsley, white wine
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Shrimp: 1 lb (peeled and deveined)
Garlic: 4 cloves (minced)
Lemon: 1 large (zested and juiced)
Parsley: 2 tablespoons (chopped)
White Wine: 1/3 cup (dry variety)
Pasta: 8 oz (spaghetti or linguine)
Steps:
1:Cook Pasta: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water, then drain.
2:Sauté Garlic: In a large pan, heat olive oil and butter. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.
3:Cook Shrimp: Add shrimp to the pan, cook until pink on both sides, about 34 minutes.
4:Deglaze with Wine: Pour in white wine, letting it reduce slightly. Add lemon juice and zest.
5:Combine Pasta: Toss cooked pasta with the shrimp mixture, reserved pasta water, and parsley. Adjust seasoning.
6:Serve: Garnish with extra parsley and serve warm.
image_path: Recipes Pictures\Garlic Lemon Wine Shrimp Pasta.jpeg

ingredients: chicken, lemon, rosemary, garlic, olive oil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 1 whole (approximately 4 lbs)
Lemon: 2 large (1 sliced, 1 juiced)
Rosemary: 4 sprigs (fresh)
Garlic: 6 cloves (smashed)
Olive Oil: 3 tablespoons
Steps:
1:Prepare Chicken: Clean the chicken and pat it dry. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2:Marinate: Rub chicken with olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and chopped rosemary. Season generously with salt and pepper.
3:Stuff Chicken: Place lemon slices, garlic cloves, and rosemary sprigs inside the chicken cavity.
4:Roast: Place chicken in a roasting pan, breast side up. Roast for 1 hour 20 minutes, basting occasionally.
5:Rest and Serve: Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes after removing from the oven, then carve and serve warm.

ingredients: rice, black beans, corn, cilantro, lime
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Rice: 1 cup (uncooked)
Black Beans: 1 cup (cooked or canned, drained and rinsed)
Corn: 1 cup (cooked or canned, drained)
Cilantro: ¼ cup (chopped)
Lime: 1 large (zested and juiced)
Steps:
1:Cook Rice: Cook rice according to package instructions until tender. Set aside to cool slightly.
2:Mix Beans and Corn: In a bowl, combine black beans and corn. Add a pinch of salt and stir.
3:Combine: Gently mix rice with the bean and corn mixture. Stir in lime zest and juice for flavor.
4:Add Cilantro: Fold in chopped cilantro, ensuring its evenly distributed.
5:Serve: Serve warm or at room temperature as a side or light meal.
image_path: Recipes Pictures\Cilantro Lime Rice and Beans.jpeg

ingredients: pasta, garlic, olive oil, sun-dried tomatoes, spinach
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 250g (e.g., spaghetti or penne)
Garlic: 4 cloves (minced)
Olive Oil: 3 tbsp
Sun-Dried Tomatoes: ½ cup (sliced)
Spinach: 2 cups (fresh)
Steps:
1:Cook Pasta: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente. Reserve ½ cup pasta water before draining.
2:Sauté Garlic: In a large skillet, heat olive oil and sauté garlic until fragrant.
3:Add Sun-Dried Tomatoes: Stir in sun-dried tomatoes and cook for 2-3 minutes to infuse the oil.
4:Wilt Spinach: Add spinach to the skillet and cook until just wilted.
5:Combine: Toss cooked pasta with the skillet mixture, adding reserved pasta water as needed for moisture.
6:Serve: Plate and garnish with additional olive oil or parmesan if desired. Enjoy warm!
image_path: Recipes Pictures\Garlic Spinach Sun-Dried Tomato Pasta.jpeg

ingredients: chicken, lemon, garlic, thyme, honey
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken: 4 boneless skinless chicken breasts (about 500g)
Lemon: 1 (zested and juiced)
Garlic: 4 cloves (minced)
Thyme: 2 tsp (fresh, chopped)
Honey: 3 tbsp
Steps:
1:Prepare Marinade: Mix lemon juice, zest, minced garlic, thyme, honey, and 2 tbsp olive oil in a bowl.
2:Marinate Chicken: Coat chicken breasts with the mixture, cover, and marinate for 30 minutes to 2 hours.
3:Preheat Oven: Set oven to 375°F (190°C) and grease a baking dish.
4:Bake Chicken: Place marinated chicken in the dish, spoon remaining marinade over, and bake for 25-30 minutes until cooked through.
5:Finish and Serve: Rest chicken for 5 minutes, then serve with sauce drizzled over. Enjoy the sweet, herby flavor!

ingredients: rice, black-eyed peas, ham, onion, garlic
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Rice: 1 cup (uncooked, rinsed)
Black-Eyed Peas: 1 ½ cups (cooked or canned, drained and rinsed)
Ham: 1 cup (diced, cooked)
Onion: 1 medium (diced)
Garlic: 3 cloves (minced)
Steps:
1:Sauté Aromatics: Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in a pot. Sauté diced onion and minced garlic until fragrant and softened.
2:Cook Ham: Add diced ham to the pot and stir for 2-3 minutes until slightly browned.
3:Add Black-Eyed Peas: Stir in black-eyed peas and cook for 2 minutes, combining flavors.
4:Cook Rice: Add rinsed rice and 2 cups of water (or broth), bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, covered, for 18-20 minutes.
5:Serve: Fluff the rice, adjust seasoning with salt and pepper, and garnish with fresh herbs if desired. Serve warm.

ingredients: pasta, tomato sauce, garlic, basil, parmesan cheese
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 300g (spaghetti or your choice)
Tomato Sauce: 2 cups (smooth or chunky as preferred)
Garlic: 4 cloves (minced)
Basil: ¼ cup (fresh leaves, chopped)
Parmesan Cheese: ½ cup (grated, plus extra for serving)
Steps:
1:Cook Pasta: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente, then drain and set aside, reserving ½ cup pasta water.
2:Sauté Garlic: Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in a pan. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
3:Simmer Sauce: Stir in tomato sauce and cook for 5 minutes. Add pasta water to adjust consistency if needed.
4:Add Basil: Stir in chopped basil and season with salt and pepper. Simmer for 2 minutes to blend flavors.
5:Combine and Serve: Toss pasta with the sauce, sprinkle with grated parmesan, and serve warm.

ingredients: beef, bell pepper, onion, teriyaki sauce, sesame seeds
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Beef (thinly sliced): 500g
Bell Peppers (sliced): 2 medium (any color)
Onion (sliced): 1 large
Teriyaki Sauce: ¼ cup
Sesame Seeds: 1 tbsp
Oil (for stir-frying): 2 tbsp
Salt and Pepper: To taste
Steps:
1:Stir-fry the Beef: Heat oil in a pan, add the beef slices, and cook for 3-4 minutes until browned. Remove from the pan and set aside.
2:Cook the Vegetables: In the same pan, add the sliced bell pepper and onion. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until tender but still crisp.
3:Combine and Add Teriyaki Sauce: Return the beef to the pan. Pour in the teriyaki sauce, and cook for another 2-3 minutes, allowing the flavors to combine.
4:Garnish and Serve: Sprinkle sesame seeds over the beef and pepper stir-fry. Serve with steamed rice or noodles.

ingredients: chicken, lemon, garlic, thyme, honey
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken Breasts (boneless, skinless): 4 pieces (about 500g)
Lemon (juiced): 1 large
Garlic (minced): 3 cloves
Thyme (fresh): 2 tbsp
Honey: 2 tbsp
Olive Oil: 1 tbsp
Salt and Pepper: To taste
Steps:
1:Prepare Marinade: In a bowl, combine lemon juice, minced garlic, thyme, honey, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Whisk until well combined.
2:Marinate the Chicken: Coat the chicken breasts with the marinade and let it sit in the fridge for at least 30 minutes to marinate.
3:Grill the Chicken: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Grill the chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side, or until fully cooked (internal temperature reaches 165°F).
4:Serve: Remove from the grill and let the chicken rest for a few minutes before serving.
image_path: Recipes Pictures\Honey Lemon Thyme Grilled Chicken.jpeg

ingredients: pasta, garlic, olive oil, cherry tomatoes, basil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta: 200g (spaghetti, penne, or your preferred type)
Garlic (minced): 3 cloves
Olive Oil: 2 tbsp
Cherry Tomatoes (halved): 1 cup
Fresh Basil (chopped): 1/4 cup
Salt and Pepper: To taste
Parmesan Cheese (optional): For garnish
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil pasta in salted water according to package instructions. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup of pasta water.
2:Sauté Garlic and Tomatoes: In a large pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant, then add cherry tomatoes and cook until softened (5-6 minutes).
3:Combine Pasta and Sauce: Add the cooked pasta to the pan with garlic and tomatoes, tossing to combine. If the sauce is too dry, add reserved pasta water a little at a time.
5:Season and Serve: Stir in chopped basil, salt, and pepper. Garnish with Parmesan cheese and serve immediately.

ingredients: salmon, lemon, garlic, dill, butter
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Salmon Fillets: 2 (about 6 oz each)
Lemon (sliced): 1 (thinly sliced)
Garlic (minced): 2 cloves
Fresh Dill (chopped): 2 tbsp
Butter: 3 tbsp (melted)
Salt and Pepper: To taste
Steps:
1:Prepare the Salmon: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet, and season with salt and pepper. Top each fillet with lemon slices.
2:Make the Dill Butter Sauce: In a small bowl, melt butter and mix in minced garlic and chopped dill. Pour this mixture evenly over the salmon fillets.
3:Bake the Salmon: Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
4:Serve: Garnish with extra fresh dill and lemon slices. Serve immediately with your choice of sides.

ingredients: beef, broccoli, garlic, soy sauce, sesame oil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Beef (sliced thinly): 1 lb (sirloin or flank steak)
Broccoli (cut into florets): 2 cups
Garlic (minced): 3 cloves
Soy Sauce: 3 tbsp
Sesame Oil: 2 tbsp
Cornstarch (optional for thickening): 1 tbsp
Water or Beef Broth: 1/4 cup
Steps:
1:Cook the Beef: In a hot skillet or wok, heat 1 tablespoon of sesame oil. Add sliced beef and cook until browned, about 3-5 minutes. Remove and set aside.
2:Stir-Fry the Broccoli: In the same skillet, add another tablespoon of sesame oil. Add broccoli florets and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until they are tender but still crisp.
3:Prepare the Garlic Sauce: In a small bowl, combine soy sauce, minced garlic, and water or beef broth. Optionally, mix in cornstarch for a thicker sauce.
4:Combine and Simmer: Return the cooked beef to the skillet with broccoli. Pour the garlic sauce over the beef and broccoli, and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until the sauce thickens and everything is coated evenly.
5:Serve: Serve the Beef and Broccoli with Garlic Sauce over rice or noodles for a complete meal.
recipe_name: Beef and Broccoli with Garlic Sauce
image_path: Recipes Pictures\Beef and Broccoli with Garlic Sauce.jpeg

ingredients: chicken, lemon, rosemary, garlic, olive oil
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken (whole): 1 (about 3-4 lbs)
Lemon (cut into wedges): 1 large
Rosemary (fresh, chopped): 2 tbsp
Garlic (minced): 4 cloves
Olive Oil: 2 tbsp
Salt and Pepper: to taste
Steps:
1:Prepare the Chicken: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Pat the chicken dry and season with salt and pepper inside and out.
2:Make the Herb Mixture: In a bowl, mix olive oil, minced garlic, chopped rosemary, and the juice of half the lemon. Rub this mixture all over the chicken.
3:Stuff the Chicken: Stuff the chicken cavity with lemon wedges and a few sprigs of rosemary.
4:Roast the Chicken: Place the chicken on a roasting pan and roast in the preheated oven for 1 to 1.5 hours, or until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (75°C) and the skin is golden and crispy.
5:Serve: Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving. Serve with roasted vegetables or your favorite side dishes.

ingredients: pasta, garlic, olive oil, spinach, feta cheese
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta (such as spaghetti or penne): 8 oz (225g)
Garlic (minced): 4 cloves
Olive Oil: 2 tbsp
Spinach (fresh): 4 cups
Feta Cheese (crumbled): 1/2 cup
Salt and Pepper: to taste
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water according to package instructions, then drain and set aside, reserving 1/2 cup of pasta water.
2:Sauté Garlic and Spinach: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Add spinach and cook until wilted, about 3 minutes.
3:Combine Pasta and Spinach: Add the cooked pasta to the pan with the spinach and garlic. Toss to combine, adding a bit of reserved pasta water if needed to create a smooth sauce.
4:Add Feta: Crumble feta cheese over the pasta and toss to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
5:Serve: Plate the pasta and serve immediately, optionally garnished with extra feta or fresh herbs

ingredients: pasta, tomato sauce, garlic, basil, mozzarella cheese
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Pasta (such as spaghetti or penne): 8 oz (225g)
Tomato Sauce: 2 cups
Garlic (minced): 4 cloves
Fresh Basil (chopped): 1/4 cup
Mozzarella Cheese (fresh, torn into pieces): 1 cup
Olive Oil: 2 tbsp
Salt and Pepper: to taste
Steps:
1:Cook the Pasta: Boil the pasta in salted water according to package instructions, then drain and set aside, reserving 1/2 cup of pasta water.
2:Sauté Garlic: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
3:Add Tomato Sauce: Pour in the tomato sauce and bring to a simmer. Let cook for 5 minutes, then season with salt and pepper to taste.
4:Combine Pasta and Sauce: Add the cooked pasta to the sauce, tossing to coat. If needed, add some reserved pasta water to achieve the desired consistency.
5:Add Mozzarella and Basil: Stir in the fresh mozzarella and chopped basil, allowing the cheese to melt into the sauce.
6:Serve: Plate the pasta and serve immediately, garnished with extra basil and mozzarella if desired.

ingredients: salmon, lemon, garlic, butter, parsley
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Salmon fillets: 4 (about 6 oz each)
Lemon: 1, juiced and zested
Garlic (minced): 3 cloves
Butter: 3 tbsp
Fresh Parsley (chopped): 2 tbsp
Olive Oil: 1 tbsp
Salt and Pepper: to taste
Steps:
1:Prepare the Salmon: Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C). Pat the salmon fillets dry and season both sides with salt and pepper.
2:Cook the Garlic and Butter: In a skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for about 1 minute until fragrant, then add butter and melt it.
3:Add Lemon and Parsley: Stir in the lemon juice, zest, and chopped parsley into the butter mixture, then simmer for 2 minutes to combine the flavors.
4:Cook the Salmon: Place the seasoned salmon fillets in the skillet, skin-side down. Cook for 3-4 minutes on each side, basting with the garlic butter sauce.
5:Serve: Once the salmon is cooked through and flaky, serve immediately with the garlic butter sauce spooned over the top.

ingredients: beef, bell pepper, onion, ginger, teriyaki sauce
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Beef (sliced thinly, such as flank steak or sirloin): 1 lb
Bell pepper (sliced): 1, medium
Onion (sliced): 1, medium
Fresh ginger (minced): 1 tbsp
Teriyaki sauce: 1/4 cup
Olive oil or vegetable oil: 1 tbsp
Garlic (minced): 2 cloves
Salt and pepper: to taste
Steps:
1:Prep the Ingredients: Slice the beef, bell pepper, and onion. Mince the garlic and ginger.
2:Cook the Beef: Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the beef and cook for 3-4 minutes until browned, then remove and set aside.
3:Sauté Vegetables and Aromatics: In the same skillet, add the onion, bell pepper, ginger, and garlic. Cook for 3-4 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
4:Combine and Simmer: Return the beef to the skillet and pour in the teriyaki sauce. Stir well to coat, and cook for 2-3 minutes until everything is heated through and the sauce has thickened.
5:Serve: Serve the stir-fry hot, garnished with additional herbs or sesame seeds, if desired.

ingredients: chicken, lemon, garlic, thyme, honey
cooking_instructions:
Ingredients:
Chicken (bone-in, skin-on pieces such as thighs or drumsticks): 4 pieces
Lemon (zested and juiced): 1
Garlic (minced): 3 cloves
Fresh thyme (chopped): 2 tbsp
Honey: 2 tbsp
Olive oil: 1 tbsp
Salt and pepper: to taste
Steps:
1:Prepare the Marinade: In a bowl, combine lemon juice, zest, minced garlic, chopped thyme, honey, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
2:Marinate the Chicken: Coat the chicken with the marinade, ensuring it's evenly covered. Let it marinate in the fridge for at least 30 minutes.
3:Preheat and Bake: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Place the marinated chicken on a baking sheet and bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the chicken reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
4:Serve: Once the chicken is cooked, remove from the oven and garnish with extra thyme and lemon slices. Serve hot with your favorite sides.
